head.title: CONTACT US - Designer Plus Size Clothing Store - by IGIGI

meta.content: Exclusive designer plus size clothing in sizes 12-32, including evening, wedding and casual dresses. We ship internationally!

img.title: Nicole Dress in Berry
img.alt: Just In - Find new arrivals like the Nicole Dress in Berry here

div.div: The New & the Next designed for the NOW! New arrivals released every week. Sign up for our newsletter to receive instant alerts on contemporary, sophisticated, & stylish looks that reflect what is currently being featured on hi-fashion runways and magazines.

img.title: Sexy Plus Size Dress
img.alt: Find the season's most sought after plus size dresses

div.p: This season's most coveted colors, select styles, and sultry shapes in cocktail dresses, casual dresses, career dresses, evening & wedding gowns.

img.title: Iman Wrap Dress
img.alt: Find classic luxury made for casual days like the Iman Wrap Dress

div.p: Classic luxury made for casual days in all different colors, shapes, lengths & styles.

img.title: Isolde Belted Dress in Parisian Green
img.alt: Arrive to work and get the job done in our Isolde Belted Dress in Parisian Green

div.p: Dress for success in the office! Choose the color, cut, or style in any of our fabulously chic work dresses.

img.title: Hayworth Dress in Amethyst
img.alt: Find all quintessential black dresses & colorful cocktail attire like the Hayworth Dress shown here

div.p: It's cocktail hour! If it's color you crave to stand out in the crowd or you're searching for that quintessential black dress that fits every occasion, we've got what you're looking for!

img.title: Garbo Gown
img.alt: A fabulous variety of evening dresses - choose floor length fairy-tale opulence like the Garbo Gown here or cute & classic in one of our must-have LBD's.

div.p: A fabulous variety of evening dresses! Choose from floor length fairy-tale opulence or cute & classic in one of our must-have LBD's.

img.title: Celine Wedding Gown
img.alt: Amidst the haze of seating charts & venue hunting don't forget to take some time for yourself and shop our beautiful Wedding Dresses.

div.p: Amidst the haze of seating charts & venue hunting don't forget to take some time for yourself and shop our beautiful Wedding Dresses.

img.title: Greenwich Top in Cocoa, Black, Plum or Terracotta
img.alt: Whether suit separates for work or cardigans for play, you'll find timeless tailoring, feminine details and tops and bottoms ta-die for here!

div.p: Whether suit separates for work or cardigans for play, you'll find timeless tailoring, feminine details and tops and bottoms ta-die for here!

img.title: Adonia Earrings
img.alt: Colorful clutches, elegant embellishments, and classic glamour is what you'll acquire in this treasure trove of accessories!

div.p: Colorful clutches, elegant embellishments, and classic glamour are what you'll acquire in this treasure trove of accessories. Time to explore!

img.title: Francine Necklace
img.alt: Unique and glamourous jewels and gems for every occation

div.p: Accent any of your IGIGI by Yuliya Raquel styles with exuberant necklaces, baroque-style rings, cuffs, unique earrings and more.

img.title: Anastasie Minaudiere
img.alt: Lend structure, texture, and an air of playfulness to your flowing evening looks with this clutch

div.p: The perfect accessory can make all the difference in your outfit. Even a little black dress can become something special when you pair it with an exquisite bag or clutch!

img.title: Tassel Belt in Bronze
img.alt: The Tassel Belt in Bronze or Silver is guaranteed to make any simple dress into a glamorous evening confection.

div.p: Adorn your look with our soft and supple scarves or cinch your waistline with our various belt options.

img.title: Undie-tectable High-waisted Panty in Nude by Spanx
img.alt: Undie-tectable High-waisted Panty in Nude by Spanx

div.p: Slim and smooth your look with shapewear under wear options.

img.title: Sale
img.alt: The SALE is on NOW! Find deeper discounts year round on all Sale Rack & Final Cut items.

div.p: Waiting for a sale is so déclassé; the SALE is on NOW! Find deeper discounts year round on all Sale Rack & Final Cut items.

img.title: Amongst the fashionable discounts you'll find a timeless mix of always-in apparel and a wide array of amazing accessories.
img.alt: Amongst the fashionable discounts you'll find a timeless mix of always-in apparel and a wide array of amazing accessories.

div.p: Amongst the fashionable discounts you'll find a timeless mix of always-in apparel and a wide array of amazing ensembles. Start exploring now!

a.title: Plus Size Wedding Party - Dresses, Shrugs, Accessories and more.

img.title: Plus Size Dietrich Top in Brown and London Midi Skirt
img.alt: Shop by Plus Size Collection

div.p: Maybe you have a certain event and don't know what's appropriate to wear or want to find something special with flare? Shop by collection and you'll find unique items with quality, fit, and comfort for any occasion.

img.title: Paloma Dress
img.alt: Paloma Dress

div.p: This section is dedicated to the current campaigns and collections that are being featured on our site.

img.title: Letta Dress in Blue in sizes 12 to 32
img.alt: Letta Dress in Blue in sizes 12 to 32

div.p: Into the Blue // Summer 2013 collection brings shades of sunset, sea glass + salt water and is all about etherial maxi's, curve-loving cocktail frocks, pretty day looks, and electric separates. This Summer give your retinas a thrill with eye-popping prints and unexpected streaks of color. The heat is on!

img.title: Eugenia Vintage Wedding Gown
img.alt: The Eugenia Vintage Wedding Gown is a delicate floral French lace gown is perfect for a vintage loving bride who prefers a touch of romance.

div.p: The Wedding Suite is driven by artistic, modern and luxurious design and style; couture-like quality and high attention to detail.

img.title: Stella Dress
img.alt: An exclusive line that is dedicated to providing you with unique, one-time only designs that are fresh, new, trendy, and reflect what is currently being featured on high-fashion runways and magazines.

div.p: Limited Collection is an exclusive collection filled with quality, on-trend, must-have pieces. Each design will have a limited quantity produced so you will have the opportunity to obtain the hottest styles with the confidence that your piece is unique.

img.title: Vika Dress in Brown
img.alt: Vika Dress in Brown

div.p: Life is hectic enough as is, so we want to make it easy for you when shopping for seasonal, on-going or one-time occasions.

img.title: Farrah Jacket & Skirt in Teal with Greenwich Top in Terracotta
img.alt: You'll find flawless tailoring with feminine details in our sophisticated Farrah Jacket & Skirt in Teal with Greenwich Top in Terracotta

div.p: You'll find flawless tailoring with feminine details in our sophisticated suits and smart separates to mix and match so you'll never get bored of your 9 to 5...look, that is!

img.title: Tarina Gown
img.alt: Beautiful coloring and sensual details are the surest way to make a statement for your bridal party

div.p: If you're looking for the perfect guest or bridesmaid dress and accessories that offer elegance, value and fashion, you'll find it here in our Wedding Party section.

img.title: Kaori Infinity Dress in Lurex
img.alt: Kaori Infinity Dress in Lurex

div.p: We know you're an on-the-go kind of gal - Here are some options to take you from conference calls to cocktail hour.

img.title: Kaori Infinity Dress in Plum
img.alt: Kaori Infinity Dress in Plum

div.p: The color, silhouette, texture or just the way it feels as it caresses your curves in all the right places - There are many reasons why items become our favorites - Below are some of ours!

img.title: Plus Size Novella Maxi Dress for Summer 2013
img.alt: Plus Size Novella Maxi Dress for Summer 2013

div.p: Summer Maxi Dresses - dress them up, dress them down: the maxi is your summer uniform. We've got bold prints, solid vibrant colors, flutter sleeves, halter and hi-low cut hems. You're sure to be a knock-out with these easy, breezy silhouettes at any summer soiree!

img.title: Phyllis Maxi Dress in Floral
img.alt: Phyllis Maxi Dress in Floral

div.p: Take your style to new heights by Injecting vibrant color into your wardrobe.

img.title: Garbo Gown
img.alt: Garbo Gown

div.p: These styles flew off the shelves quicker than they could be replenished. Back by popular demand, they were recut, remade & now they're back in action!

div.p: Through rich and raw video content, compelling imagery, talented sketches, and future fashion releases this is our creative vision, this is our point of view . We invite you to flip through, take a look, discover, share with others and enjoy!

img.title: In Motion - IGIGI's Latest Campaign Video
img.alt: In Motion - IGIGI's Latest Campaign Video

div.p: Click to preview our latest campaign behind-the-scene footage & find out what inspired Yuliya and the team.

img.title: MARIE CLAIRE EPISODES
img.alt: MARIE CLAIRE EPISODES

div.p: Check out style expert Marcy Guevara give plus-size fashion tips inspired by the hit Marie Claire column Big Girl in a Skinny World. Click on current available items to purchase.

img.title: Wallpaper Gallery - lush images for your computer background
img.alt: Wallpaper Gallery - lush images for your computer background

div.p: Our most fierce fashion sketches and compelling campaign images for your viewing pleasure or downloadable for your own computer screen background so you can have a piece of IGIGI where ever you are!

img.title: Media Look Book S/S 2012
img.alt: Media Look Book S/S 2012

div.p: Flip through our most recent Media Look Book filled with fashions set for release in the near future. Click on current available items to purchase.

img.title: Plus size curve connection beauties
img.alt: Plus size curve connection beauties

div.p: Curve Connection is our community of real women showcasing their curves and rocking IGIGI by Yuliya Raquel their way!
Come join & share your style!

img.title: Weekend Glam Guide
img.alt: Weekend Glam Guide

div.p: Need help styling? Need ideas for what to wear to an occasion? Want to know what's on trend? We've got you covered! Sign up for our newsletter and we'll show you what's hot, how to wear it, and where to wear it to. - The Weekly Glam Guide every Saturday morning!

img.alt: please wait...

div.a: More about Plus Size Fashion & IGIGI by Yuliya Raquel
div.p: IGIGI specializes in sexy and sophisticated plus size fashion with an emphasis on formal wear, wedding gowns, other types of dresses as well as separates. We believe that words like "ample," "opulent," "curvaceous," and "voluptuous" should be mainstays in the fashion dictionary. It is important to accentuate and celebrate the beauty and sensuality of the female figure rather than cover it up with piles of fabric. You ARE beautiful!
div.div:
© IGIGI by Yuliya Raquel 2012
267 8th Street, San Francisco, CA 94103 USA 1.877.597.8953
